name: Typestyles
description:
Generate textstyles in seconds using font-size font-family and more —


🔌 What do I do with this plugin?


You basically batch generate Textstyles.

1. Simply select the typefaces you want to generate a textstyle from

2. Think a second about how you want to name your styles

3. Choose from an already wide range of modifiers to branch your textstyles. More to come.

4. Generate!


🤷‍♂️ But why?


Well … if you have to generate textstyles from time to time it is not that much fun in Figma. It really is just a lot of clicking and Typing.


This plugin currently can not:

- Batch delete textstyles

- Batch update textstyles


Feedback and inspiration is welcomed!

If you’d also like to donate for a coffee I’d appreciate it a lot! ☕️


paypal.me/mauns
